# PrepForge Project Instructions

## Project Overview
PrepForge is a full-stack interview preparation platform with AI-powered mock interviews and real-time human interviews.

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: React + TypeScript + TailwindCSS
- Backend: Node.js + Express + TypeScript
- AI: Groq/OpenAI APIs
- Database: PostgreSQL
- Video: WebRTC
- Authentication: JWT

## Progress Tracking
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md
- [x] Scaffold the Project (Backend & Frontend created)
- [x] Customize the Project (All core files created)
- [x] Install Dependencies (npm install completed for both)
- [ ] Setup Database (Run Prisma migrations)
- [ ] Test & Run Application
